displayName.text: New York Facial & Body Rejuvenation - Manhattan

formattedAddress: 49 E 78th St #1b, New York, NY 10075, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: New York Facial & Body Rejuvenation - Manhattan

adrFormatAddress: 49 E 78th St #1b, New York, NY 10075, USA

originalText.text:
I went to NYFBR last month for Botox treatment, and I don’t even know how/where to begin sharing my amazing experience!

1. Doctor who knows what he’s doing AND actually listens to your concerns and desired outcomes- CHECK!

2. Kind, welcoming, and super professional staff- CHECK!

3. BEAUTIFUL office conveniently located between Madison & Park AND follows proper health guidelines- CHECK!

This was only the 3rd time I ever got Botox but honestly, I wouldn’t want to go to anyone else; Dr. Mir is excellent!!! I am very facially expressive and first got Botox because I noticed that my makeup would crease on my forehead over the last couple of years and I couldn’t stand it! Because of genetics’ concerns, I decided it would be a good idea for some immediate as well as preventative care. Dr. Mir’s gentle techniques helped eliminate my lines but also didn’t make my eyebrows sit too low either and I have been extremely satisfied with my results! I also informed Dr. Mir of how I did develop bruising and some swelling the other couple times I had gotten Botox before. Upon completion of the injections, he whipped out this amazing magical ointment and told me I wouldn’t need to worry about bruising or swelling, and I didn’t!! He had applied Arnica and I honestly wasn’t sure it would help because I am prone to bruising and swelling BUT IT WORKED and I didn’t have to cover it up with makeup!

I am very facially expressive and first got Botox because I noticed that my makeup would crease on my forehead over the last couple of years and I couldn’t stand it! Because of genetics’ concerns, I decided it would be a good idea for some immediate as well as preventative care. originalText.text: This office is super chic and welcoming on arrival. Dr. Waseem and his partner Nargis is extremely knowledgeable and professional, and not to mention, very very particular when it comes to treating their clients. They don’t push for any treatments.  I would not go anywhere else! He did an amazing job on my sisters Botox. No bruising swelling noted. You couldn’t even tell that she had anything done just the day after! I can’t wait to go get my much needed treatments done and I would look no where else, but to go to this power couples medi spa!

originalText.text:
I’ve never met a doctor who cares so much about the well-being of his patients. I initially went to Dr. Mir for cosmetic purposes to inquire about different
types of facial treatments he offered. I immediately learned how knowledgeable he was on healing from the inside out. I was going through a period where I wanted to get my autoimmune disease (Hashimotos thyroiditis) under control. He offered to do energy testing and help me with my vitamins so I could feel my best. It has worked and Dr. Mir is a big part of why I’ve felt so great this past year. Dr. Mir has also offered me cupping to help with my aches due to marathon training. I always feel great when I leave, thank you again!

text.text:
I’ve never met a doctor who cares so much about the well-being of his patients. I initially went to Dr. Mir for cosmetic purposes to inquire about different
types of facial treatments he offered. I immediately learned how knowledgeable he was on healing from the inside out. I was going through a period where I wanted to get my autoimmune disease (Hashimotos thyroiditis) under control. He offered to do energy testing and help me with my vitamins so I could feel my best. It has worked and Dr. Mir is a big part of why I’ve felt so great this past year. Dr. Mir has also offered me cupping to help with my aches due to marathon training. I always feel great when I leave, thank you again!

originalText.text: I love Dr Mir and his staff. They are always kind and professional and he does a great job.
